scripts.example-app:start-db: npm run example-app:cleanup-db && cd ../app && wasp start db
scripts.example-app:start-app: npm run example-app:wait-for-db && cd ../app && wasp db migrate-dev && wasp start
scripts.example-app:cleanup-db: (docker container rm $(docker container ls -f name=^wasp-dev-db-OpenSaaS- -q) -f || true) && docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -f name=^wasp-dev-db-OpenSaaS- -q) -f || true
